title: Chapter 322 - I’M Glad You’Re Still Alive
volume_title: For Whom Do The Funeral Bells Toll In The Jade Capital?
body:
Chapter 322 - I’M Glad You’Re Still Alive

The ninth floor of the Overflowing Goblet.

Phoenix Song Palace. 

“Young Lord, that esteemed personage is waiting inside. Allow me to bid you farewell here,” said Qiao Yu with a charming smile.

Su Yi nodded, watched Qiao Yu leave, then said to Fang Yuan, “You wait here.”

With that, he pushed open the door and entered Phoenix Song Palace.

The interior had a classical elegance, but there was only one person seated there, a handsome young man in jade-colored robes.

This was none other than the sixth prince, Zhou Zhili!

When he saw Su Yi, he shot to his feet and went up to greet him. “Brother Su, thank you for coming all the way here in person. I’m sorry to trouble you; it’s just that my status is a bit unusual. Were I to visit you at Pinewind Villa, numerous people would watch my every move. Please, forgive me.”

Su Yi waved his concerns away. “Let’s hear it. What’s the urgent matter you mentioned in your letter?”

Earlier, at Pinewind Villa, it had been Zhou Zhili who’d sent that message.

Otherwise, Su Yi couldn’t have been bothered to come all the way here in person.

As he spoke, he casually sat down, filled his glass, and started drinking.

However, Zhou Zhili was nowhere near...
original_title: Chapter 322 - I’m Glad You’re Still Alive
